import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function Login() { const [email,setEmail]=useState(); const [password,setPassword]=useState(); const [error,setError]=useState(); axios.defaults.withCredentials=true const handleEmail=(e)=>{ setEmail(e.target.value) } const handlePassword=(e)=>{ setPassword(e.target.value) } const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:8000/login',{email,password}) .then(res=>setError(res.data)) } return (

Login

{error &&
{error}
}
) } export default Login
